projects.name: FlipStyle

projects.name: ClientSphere
description: Created a customer management web app with CRUD functionality, that facilitates management of customer data.
Implemented decorators for authorization and login, and signals for automated group assignment post registration.

Deployed the database on Amazon RDS and utilized AWS S3 for hosting static files and storing user profile images.

projects.name: IntelliChoice - Streamlining Decision Making
description: Engineered a python package that implements TOPSIS algorithm, a multiple-criteria decision-making algorithm.
The project offers an efficient decision-making solution for complex scenarios, providing valuable insights and recommendations to users.
Created a Flask based web service, enabling users to input data, calculate TOPSIS scores and ranks, and receive the results via email within just 2 seconds.
